programmes.show_description: Discover the elegance of Faith & Brown with Vicki's stunning jewellery collection. Embrace sleek designs crafted in Italy from precious metals and let yourself feel truly beautiful.
Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.
Discover fresh inspiration with New Season Garden Stories. Explore vibrant plants, expert tips, and creative ideas to help your garden thrive this spring. Tune in for your garden makeover!

Relax in style with our wonderful selection of loungewear. Wonderfully warm separates in cosy fabrics will help you to make the most of your downtime.
Refresh your style with Wallis, now at QVC! Explore chic, contemporary fashion designed to elevate your everyday wardrobe and inspire confidence.
Discover stylish wardrobe updates with Dorothy Perkins, now at QVC! Explore versatile fashion pieces designed to flatter and inspire your everyday look.
Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.
Refresh your wardrobe with ONLY Fashion. Discover effortless, on-trend pieces perfect for everyday styling and easy confidence, whatever your plans.

Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.
Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.
